title: Stage Lv5-A1-S04
description: Level 5 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Analysis began after data collection was completed. (academic variant 1)
Statistical significance was confirmed across all variables. (academic variant 1)
learning_points: Level 5 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 데이터 수집이 완료된 후 분석을 시작했습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Analysis began after data collection was completed. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 통계적 유의성이 모든 변수에서 확인되었습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Statistical significance was confirmed across all variables. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 상관관계 분석 결과 강한 연관성이 나타났습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Correlation analysis revealed strong associations. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 표본의 대표성이 모집단 추론을 가능하게 합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Sample representativeness enables population inference. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 분산 분석을 통해 집단 간 차이를 검증했습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: We verified group differences through variance analysis. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 회귀 분석이 예측 모형의 정확성을 보여줍니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Regression analysis demonstrates the accuracy of the predictive model. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 수집된 증거가 가설을 뒷받침합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: The collected evidence supports the hypothesis. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 분포의 정규성이 분석 방법 선택에 영향을 미쳤습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: The normality of distribution influenced the choice of analytical methods. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 다변량 분석을 통해 복합적 관계를 규명했습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: We identified complex relationships through multivariate analysis. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 데이터의 신뢰구간이 결과의 정확성을 보장합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: The confidence interval of data ensures result accuracy. (academic variant 1)
